ValidationRule.description: This rule will prevent users from registering generic email domains.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "gmail"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "hotmail"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "yahoo"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "outlook"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "aol"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "icloud"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "gmx.com"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "onmail"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "mail.com"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "fastmail.com"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "proton.me"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "live.com"), CONTAINS (LOWER(Domain__c), "live.dk"), (RIGHT (LOWER(Domain__c), 3)) == ".ru" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to register a generic domain. Please input a valid company domain.
